column5: Eastern sunrise and South Padre Island views greet you from the 3 decks at this gorgeous multi-level sea cottage! Beautiful tropical decor completes the mood and beckons you to enjoy the good things in life! Available to rent year round, this vacation home has all you need. King master, Queen and also a Twin bed with pull out Trundle in 2nd bedroom . Maximum sleeping capacity: 6. Please note that from Memorial Day to Labor Day, weekly only (no monthly) reservations are accepted.
